defs.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

style.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

path.style: opacity: 1; fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 7px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: square; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;
opacity: 1; fill: none; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

g.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

text.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(169, 169, 169); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: middle; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: helvetica_neuelight_italic, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-style: italic;

g.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

polygon.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(77, 106, 168); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

text.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; text-anchor: middle; dominant-baseline: middle; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: helvetica_neuelight, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

foreignObject.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

div.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal;
